title: 10(1) of the Universities Act 1997 (No. 24 of 1997) and the Further and Higher
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the National University of Ireland, Galway
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the National University of Ireland, Galway 

(Change of Name of University) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited national university ireland galway (change name university) order 2024

title: 10(1) of the Universities Act 1997 (No. 24 of 1997) and the Further and Higher
heading: 2. This Order shall come into operation on 21 February 2024.
text_raw: 2. This Order shall come into operation on 21 February 2024.

title: 10(1) of the Universities Act 1997 (No. 24 of 1997) and the Further and Higher
heading: 3. The name of the university, the present name whereof is, in the English
text_raw:
3. The name of the university, the present name whereof is, in the English 
language, the National University of Ireland, Galway and, in the Irish 
language, Ollscoil na hÉireann, Gaillimh, is hereby changed, in the English 
language, to that of University of Galway and, in the Irish language, to that of 
Ollscoil na Gaillimhe. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

23 February, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 27th February, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [62] 3
